author: hwright
msg: Fix the JavaHL build...again, this time in response to r26790.  This
just addscode which fixes the build in the C++ layer, without
propogating changes back to Java.  (Though that should probably happen

author: dlr
msg: Fix issue #2859, completing changelist support for our Relax NG XML
(status): Add changelist as a potential child element.
(changelist, attlist.changelist): Define element and its attribute list.
header, adding support for an XML header and footer.
